content: That's really helpful, thanks! I've been trying out different moisturizers, but I haven't tried the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel yet. Do you think it would work well for my skin type, considering it's a mix of dark Indian skin and fair Irish complexion? And by the way, have you come across any skincare products that cater specifically to half Korean and half Mexican skin tones, like the woman I met at the cultural festival?
